pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Nil Type[![Codecov](https://img.shields.io/codecov/c/github/nikitanovosibirsk/niltype/master.svg?style=flat-square)](https://codecov.io/gh/nikitanovosibirsk/niltype)[![PyPI](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/niltype.svg?style=flat-square)](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/niltype/)[![PyPI - Downloads](https://img.shields.io/pypi/dm/niltype?style=flat-square)](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/niltype/)[![Python Version](https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/niltype.svg?style=flat-square)](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/niltype/)Null value for cases when `None` is part of a data model```pythonfrom niltype import Nilif x is Nil: # True only if x is Nil pass```### Example```pythonfrom niltype import Nildef get(dictionary, key, default=Nil): try: return dictionary[key] except KeyError: if default is not Nil: return default raiseget({}, 'key') # raises KeyErrorget({}, 'key', None) # returns None```### Installation```shpip3 install niltype```
